instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Photos app . At the top right, tap your Google Account profile picture. Look for one of the following messages: Backup complete: Your upload is complete and you have no more items waiting to back up Backup is off: Backup and sync is turned off. To turn on backup, tap Turn on backup . Backing up: Your photos and videos are currently backing up. You ll also find the number of items remaining. Preparing backup or Getting ready to back up: Your photos and videos are getting ready to back up. Waiting for connection or Waiting for Wi-Fi: Change your settings or connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network.

Open your device's Settings app (not the Google Settings app). Tap Apps and notifications and then Google Photos app . Tap Disable and wait a bit. Tap Enable . On your Android device, open the Google Photos app . Sign in to your Google Account. Menu and then Settings and then Back up & sync settings . Turn on Back up & sync .
